item.title: About
item.description: About Link to heading Hi! I’m Heidi. Full Stack Developer and former Bioscientist. I started my career as a bioscientist, but doing image and data analysis I quickly came to appreciate just how much software and coding skills can aid us. So started my journey deeper into the world of computers, mind you I had some small casual interest from before. But as it often is, one needs some sort of a push to change directions in life.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact me on the usual platforms or via email heidi.alikippari@gmail.com 📝 https://github.com/heidiali/ https://www.linkedin.com/in/heidi-ali-kippari/ https://gitlab.com/heidiali/
